events.name: The Smash Brothers of Nu Delta
events.description: Join in on the chaos of an all-out 8-player Smash on the big screen with the brothers of Nu Delta! Devour a slice of pizza and quench your thirst with soda after the heat of battle.

events.name: ND Lounging
events.description: Want to party tonight? We'll be ready to party hop with you. Or maybe you'd just like to take the night off and relax? Either way, come meet and chill with the brothers of Nu Delta at our house. There will be delicious chicken wings, good music, games, and more to go around!

events.name: Nu Smoothies
events.description: All partied out tonight? Looking for something to eat? Stop by Nu Delta on your way home to close out the night with snacks and some next level smoothies.

events.name: Tex-Mex Breakfast
events.description: Swing by Nu Delta for an amazing Tex-Mex style breakfast with chorizo, omelettes, and breakfast burritos. There will be bacon.

events.name: Rock Bed BBQ
events.description: Nothing beats a good burger on a Saturday afternoon on Nu Delta's iconic Phoenix Rock Garden with great music and the brothers of Nu Delta.

events.name: The D is for Dance
events.description: Are you ready to get your groove on with the brothers of Nu Delta? Cuz it's Saturday night and we're in the spot. Don't believe me? Just watch. Come dance to your hearts content to nothing but the greatest hits. Oh yeah, we have a dog, too.
